entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:08 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 02:40 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
